services.map

Class MapRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.map.MapRenderer

  • public class MapRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    This service is used to render the values of the model on a canvas with a GraphicsContext.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double INTERSECTION_SIZE
      Diameter of a simple intersection.
      static double WAYPOINT_SIZE
      Diameter of a waypoint

      Draw the routes of the planning, its waypoints (warehouse and delivery addresses) with their index.

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public static javafx.scene.paint.Color getColor(double step,
                                                double nbStep)
        Returns the color to use to draw a streetsection dependending on the ratio of the position compared to the total. The goal is to circle other all the hues.
        Parameters:
        step - Current step.
        nbStep - Total number of steps
        Returns:
        The color to use the for the street section

public void drawCityMap(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                                                           CityMap cityMap)
        Draw the intersections and street sections of the city map
        Parameters:
        gc - Context to use to draw.
        cityMap - The city map to draw.

public void drawPlanning(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,

      • drawArrowBetweenStreetSection

        public void drawArrowBetweenStreetSection(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                                          StreetSection street,
                                          javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Draw the point of an arrow at two thirds of the provided street section.
        Parameters:
        gc - Context to use to draw.
        street - Street section to use to draw the point of the arrow
        color - Color to use to draw the point of the arrow.
